anathema: Betray another’s trust, place conflict between ideological differences over people’s lives
edict: Seek to improve yourself and your community, trust those you work with, encourage cooperation

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Mazludeh (Mother of Hearth and Wall)](/Deities.aspx?ID=680)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 18

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** Seek to improve yourself and your community, trust those you work with, encourage cooperation

**Anathema** Betray another’s trust, place conflict between ideological differences over people’s lives

**Area of Concern**
Balance, community, negotiation, and twilight

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39)

**Favored Weapon** [Shield Boss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=396)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=66), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Perfection](/Domains.aspx?ID=89)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Share Lore](/Spells.aspx?ID=2363)

- **4th**
[Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=1667)

- **5th**
[Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=1751)

</column>
name: Mazludeh (Mother of Hearth and Wall)
religious_symbol: Seven eggs encircled by an ouroboros
